note: The order of objects in this list is important

tiers.description:
Receive personalized offers and comps, including free or discounted hotel rooms.

Plus, you can turn Reward Credits into free play! SEE FULL BENEFITS
tiers.name: GOLD
tiers.mobiledescription: Receive personalized offers and comps, including free or discounted hotel rooms. Plus, you can turn Reward Credits into free play!

tiers.description: With your Platinum status, enjoy additional benefits like one free night in Las Vegas or Atlantic City, free valet and self-parking, extra discounts at casino gift shops, and a complimentary stay at Atlantis, Paradise Island. SEE FULL BENEFITS
tiers.name: PLATINUM
tiers.mobiledescription: With your Platinum status, enjoy additional benefits like one free night in Las Vegas or Atlantic City, free valet and self-parking, extra discounts at casino gift shops, and a complimentary stay at Atlantis, Paradise Island.

tiers.description: Enjoy even more benefits with your Diamond status. No resort fees on any hotel stay, a $100 Celebration Dinner, as well as access to Laurel Lounges and priority lines at hotel check-in, restaurants and casino cages. SEE FULL BENEFITS
tiers.name: DIAMOND
tiers.mobiledescription: Enjoy even more benefits with your Diamond status. No resort fees on any hotel stay, a $100 Celebration Dinner, as well as access to Laurel Lounges and priority lines at hotel check-in, restaurants and casino cages.

tiers.description: Enjoy complimentary Laurel Lounge access with your Diamond Plus status, along with your favorite Diamond benefits like no resort fees on any hotel stay and priority lines at hotel check-in, restaurants and casino cages. SEE FULL BENEFITS
tiers.name: DIAMOND PLUS
tiers.mobiledescription: Enjoy complimentary Laurel Lounge access with your Diamond Plus status, along with your favorite Diamond benefits like no resort fees on any hotel stay and priority lines at hotel check-in, restaurants and casino cages.

tiers.description: Take advantage of a $600 airfare credit to Las Vegas with your Diamond Elite status, as well as complimentary Laurel Lounge access, no resort fees on any hotel stay, and more. SEE FULL BENEFITS
tiers.name: DIAMOND ELITE
tiers.mobiledescription: Take advantage of a $600 airfare credit to Las Vegas with your Diamond Elite status, as well as complimentary Laurel Lounge access, no resort fees on any hotel stay, and more.

tiers.description:
As a Seven Stars member, you receive VIP treatment through and through, from unforgettable trips to access like no other. SEE FULL BENEFITS

Surpass the threshold of Seven Stars status and unlock one-of-a-kind Signature Experiences. LEARN MORE
tiers.name: SEVEN STARS
tiers.mobiledescription: As a Seven Stars member, you receive VIP treatment through and through, from unforgettable trips to access like no other.
